name: Hope For Tomorrow
description:
Sometimes it feels like you’re in such a deep dark abyss that it’s almost impossible to climb back from there. But there is always hope. Climb higher and brighten your gloomy thoughts one by one to find a better tomorrow. There are 100 clouds of thought to brighten. Touch cloud with your body or helperstick.

Made for Gamedev.js Jam 2020  with a theme: "Future"

Controls:

A=left 

D=right

W=jump

Space=helping stick

Tools:
  • Construct 2
  • Krita
  • Gimp
  • Audacity
  • Beepbox
Assets:
  • Bg music: The Ants Built A City On His Chest by Doctor Turtle (Free Music Archive.org) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ 
  • Font: Usuazi Hosomozi by Goma Shin (Dafont.com)
